title.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
title.subline: Everything you need to know about Binbang.

service.a1: Binbang automatically monitors accommodation booking sites (Airbnb, Agoda, etc.) for vacancies and sends email and KakaoTalk alerts when a room becomes available.
service.a2: We currently support Airbnb and Agoda. We plan to add more platforms in the future.

monitoring.a1: It depends on your plan. The Free plan checks every 30 minutes, while the Pro plan checks every minute.
monitoring.a2: Email alerts are included by default. You can also receive real-time KakaoTalk alerts by connecting your Kakao account.
monitoring.a3: Yes, Binbang monitors around the clock, 365 days a year. Our heartbeat system ensures stable operation at all times.

account.a1: You can sign up easily with your Google account. Your email is used only for account identification and sending alerts.
account.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.
account.a3: Full refund if requested within 7 days of payment.

other.a1: Binbang collects only minimal information through Google OAuth. Your email is used solely for account identification and sending alerts. Please see our Privacy Policy for details.
other.a2: Please email us at support@binbang.moodybeard.com and we'll get back to you promptly.
